Description: COUNTRY1 and COUNTRY2 are having a dispute on the status of Neutralia.
A massive oil deposit has been found at the border of COUNTRY1 and COUNTRY2. However, they both claim a majority of the area, citing historical rights. To which country will you award it to?
A group of refugees turn up at a COUNTRY1 border checkpoint. COUNTRY1 is uncertain about them, and refuses to let them in, leaving them in COUNTRY2.
